descriptionlist.description:
Hack Features:
- Coin Hack

- MULTI ITEM
-ALL TICKETS EARNED 9999
-STARS AFTER RACE 9999
-INSTANT MAX LEVEL OF ANY PURCHASED / WON CHARACTERS
-INSTANT MAX LEVEL OF ANY PURCHASED / WON KARTS
-INSTANT MAX LEVEL OF ANY PURCHASED / WON GLIDERS
-COIN MULTIPLIER AFTER RACE
-MAX RACE TICKETS
-MAX MYSTERY BOX TICKETS

- TICKET HACK ( SPEND TO GET )
- JAILBREAK bypass pre-installed

This hack is an In-Game Mod Menu (iGMM).
In order to activate the Mod Menu, tap on the iOSGods button found inside the app.
﻿ ﻿
